alert.note: Alert for Dickinson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 9:29PM CDT until April 12 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Dickinson County in central Kansas... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 929 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Solomon to 6 miles southeast of Salina to Lindsborg, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Abilene, Solomon, Enterprise and Carlton. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 267 and 275. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
